#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace::std;
int main(){
    int n,i,j;
    char ch[150],str[150],x;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    scanf("%c",&x);
    while(n--){
      cin.getline(str,150);
      i=0;
      j=0;
      while(str[i]){
       j=0;
      while(str[i] && str[i]!=' ')
        ch[j++]=str[i++];
      ch[j]='\0';
      if(!strcmp(ch,"8")) printf("ate");
      else if(!strcmp(ch,"w8")) printf("wait");
      else if(!strcmp(ch,"gr8")) printf("great");
      else if(!strcmp(ch,"4")) printf("for");
      else if(!strcmp(ch,"b4")) printf("before");
      else printf("%s",ch);
      if(str[i]) printf(" "), i++;
      else printf("\n");
      }
      }
    return 0;
}
